name: tribal-craft
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform for traditional Indian tribal crafts

scripts.install-all: cd tribalcraft-backend && npm install && cd ../tribalcraft-frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd tribalcraft-backend && npm run dev" "cd tribalcraft-frontend && npm start"
scripts.build-frontend: cd tribalcraft-frontend && npm install && npm run build
